name: Astro Angler (Luke White)
description:
An relaxing arcade fishing game. Catch fish to buy items to catch more fish! Upgrade your rod, bait, hook, and reel to cast and catch fish further in the void of space... With over 11 fish to catch and 22 items to collect, Astro Angler will keep you engaged for hours! Can you catch them all?

Created in collaboration with Group U: Jake Flemans, Martin Blenkhorn, James Mountford, Zhanybek Dauletov, Joseph Sandilands, and Luke White.
